description: Depart from Kabeyun Trail-head (N48° 20.417' W88° 49.341') in Sleeping Giant Park. Park day pass required for vehicle. Mountain bike down the Kabeyen Trailhead (N48° 19.207' W88° 53.939') to turnoff to Talus trail, about 7.5 k (or run/hike). Lock bikes up and hike in the rest (not suitable for biking). Steep hills. Time will vary depending on whether you use bikes, run or leisurely hike. Must be fit and able to climb up and down steep trails.
directions: Drive East 33.7 km from the intersection of Hodder Ave and hwy 11/17 (Thunder Bay). Then head South on hwy 587 36.5 km to Kabeyun  Trail-Head (watch for sign).
title: Talus Lake Trail
